Plot: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.
Title: Your Highness
Actors: Danny McBride, James Franco, Rasmus Hardiker, Natalie Portman
tomatoConsensus: Big budgets and costumes in service of scatalogical jokes may seem funny on paper, but in execution this is a highly monotonous romp that registers only occasional laughs.
